import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import {GrCart} from 'react-icons/gr'; const CHeader=()=>{ const[categories, setCategories] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ loadUsers(); },[]); const loadUsers = async ()=>{ const result = await axios.get("http://localhost:8070/category/"); setCategories(result.data.reverse()); }; return(
{categories.map((cate, index) => ( {cate.cate_name} ))}
  • Home
  • About
  • Contact Us
  • Offers
Profile My Orders
Log Out
) } export default CHeader;
